title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million euros, with a total of 2 data points.
Overall Revenue in million euros has increased over the Year
Revenue in million euros is roughly constant from 2012 to 2013.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Max Revenue in million euros about 14525.69 was recorded at Year 2013
Min Revenue in million euros about 14109.4 was recorded at Year 2012
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million euros with a total of 2 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2013 to 2012.
